Aromatica LIVELY SuperBarrier Cica-Panthenol Serum (2019 formulation)

Brand: AROMATICA

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Propanediol, Panthenol, Polyglyceryl-3 methylglucose distearate, Caprylic/capric triglyceride, Triethyl citrate, Octyldodecanol, Betaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene glycol, Viola mandshurica flo

iola mandshurica flower extract, Gardenia florida fruit extract, Glyceryl glucoside, Glyceryl stearate, Cetearyl alcohol, Stearic acid, Sodium lauroyl glutamate, Limnanthes alba seed oil, Simmondsia chinensis seed oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Verbena officinalis extract, Rosmarinus officinalis leaf extract, Chamomilla recutita flower extract, Sodium hy

r extract, Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed glycosaminoglycans, Sodium hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, Hyaluronic acid, Sclerotium gum, Pentylene glycol, Madecassoside, Tamarindus indica seed polysaccharide

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproduc
